ISerialize

Defines an interface for serializing out objects to some stream.

Functions
Load
virtual void Load(
IStream *pStream
) = 0

Loads an object from the specified stream

Parameters
pStream
IStream*

Stream to read from

IStream *pStream
) = 0

Saves an object to the specified stream

Parameters
